title: Antiques and Murder
description: Living in a small town can make it hard to find a date. So when a sexy new neighbor turns out to be a blast from the past, twenty-nine year old Jemma-Leigh is more than ready to give it a try, not even nosy neighbors and a meddling mother can stop her. When a customer from her antique shop is found murdered, people suspect her new man. Determined to prove his innocence, She sets out to uncover the truth. Can she navigate the murky waters of family, love and murder? Will she find find the killer before the killer finds her?This is a novella of approx. 20,000 words. While erotica is not the focus of this story, it does contain sexual and adult content. Reader discretion is advised.
author: Elle Griffin
